document_data.caption: A map showing Oakvale on the shore of the Myrloch west of the Fens of the Fallen.
document_data.name: Oakvale
document_data.mainbody: '''Oakvale''' was a small forest located on the isle of [[Gwynneth]] within the [[Moonshae Isles]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Moonshaeslc}}
document_data.Geography: Oakvale sat along the southern shore of the [[Myrloch]] within the [[Myrloch Vale]] of central Gwynneth. The forest lay due west of the [[Fens of the Fallen]]. The forest was surrounded to the south by [[the Highlands]] mountains.
